analytics-consent.title: Analytics Consent
analytics-consent.body: We would like to analyze how you use this service, first we want to make sure you are right with it.
analytics-consent.more-info:
First of all highlight that no information would be given to third parties. We use Matomo, a better alternative to Google Analytics, with this we respect your privacy as much as possible. We collect the following data:
  • IP address: the IP address you access to the web, the last 2 of it are removed. That is 192.168.1.152 is saved as 192.168.0.0
  • Browser, OS and screen resolution: this is automatically sent by your browser. With this information we can know what type of device you are using, PC, smartphone, TV, etc.
  • Main browser language: instead of tracking your country using the IP address we use the browser language, also we will consider adding those languages to the site.
We use cookies to store some of your preferences. If you wanna know more send me an e-mail.
